about_the_game:
The high energy soundtrack from Steel Assault is here. Get ready for a modern intense musical experience that also pays homage to the good old days of video game music. 18 powerful tracks mixing rock, chiptune and industrial music with an additional FM-synthesized remix album of all tracks.

Composers: Joseph Bailey, Luke McQueen
FM-synthesized arrangements by Luke McQueen

Additional composers and producers: Coda, Joey Lopes and Sri Kankanahalli.
detailed_description:
The high energy soundtrack from Steel Assault is here. Get ready for a modern intense musical experience that also pays homage to the good old days of video game music. 18 powerful tracks mixing rock, chiptune and industrial music with an additional FM-synthesized remix album of all tracks.

Composers: Joseph Bailey, Luke McQueen
FM-synthesized arrangements by Luke McQueen

Additional composers and producers: Coda, Joey Lopes and Sri Kankanahalli.

name: Steel Assault Complete Game Soundtrack
reviews:
“A superb, fast-paced and aggressive soundtrack that adds a layer of pressure and anxiety to the experience. Beautiful FM-synthesized tunes with just enough industrial rock and chiptune to please bit-crunched music fans.”
COGconnected

“A high-energy chiptune and metal soundtrack that is absolutely perfect for the ridiculous pace and intensity of the game”
NintendoLife
short_description: The high energy soundtrack from Steel Assault is here. Get ready for a modern intense musical experience that also pays homage to the good old days of video game music. 18 powerful tracks mixing rock, chiptune and industrial music with an additionnal FM-synthesized remix album of all tracks.
